Label.description: This is an optional label, displayed beneath the KPI components.

RightMetric.description: The KPI metric value displays at the right side.

RightUnit.description: The KPI unit value displays at the right side.

LeftMetric.description: The KPI metric value displays at the left side.

LeftUnit.description: The KPI unit value displays at the left side.

Label.description: The string value is a style class name of `Label`.

RightMetric.description: The string value is a style class name of `RightMetric`. On the Android platform, the `RightMetric` must be defined for displaying the Metric view.

RightUnit.description: The string value is a style class name of `RightUnit`.

LeftMetric.description: The string value is a style class name of `LeftMetric`. On the Android platform, the `LeftMetric` is dependent on the `RightMetric`. If the `RightMetric` is not defined, the `LeftMetric` will not be displayed even if the `LeftMetric` is defined in the KPIView.

LeftUnit.description: The string value is a style class name of `LeftUnit`.
